name: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Protein Cookies
author: Marinna Bateman
summary: These are delicious oatmeal cookies, packed with protein, that taste like regular cookies!
ingredients: 2 cups quick-cooking oats (such as Robin Hood®)
½ cup milk chocolate chips (such as President's Choice®)
2 scoops vanilla protein powder (such as Leanfit® 100% Whey Protein Blend)
6 tablespoons smooth peanut butter (such as Kraft®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine oats, chocolate chips, sugar, protein powder, baking soda, and salt in a medium bowl
Add peanut butter, 1 egg, and vanilla extract; mix well
Knead until dough is thick and sticky
Drop tablespoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart onto the prepared baking sheets
Using your palm, slightly flatten cookies
Bake in the preheated oven until the bottoms and edges are golden brown, about 10 minutes
Let cool for 2 minutes on the pan before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely
